titles.title: A bill to establish the composition known as America the Beautiful as the national anthem.
A bill to establish the composition known as America the Beautiful as the national anthem.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: Designates the composition consisting of the words and music known as "America the Beautiful" as the national anthem. (Under current law, the composition known as the Star-Spangled Banner is recognized as the nation's national anthem.)
